document.full_text: hazardous materials crews investigated an alaska airlines flight with 150 people on board at john wayne airport in orange county on friday after a flight attendant found a powdery substance that was ultimately found to be harmless, authorities and the airline said.
document.title: powder triggers scare on alaska airlines flight
lines_and_colors: hazardous materials crews investigated an alaska airlines flight with 150 people on board at john wayne airport in orange county on friday after a flight attendant found a powdery substance that was ultimately found to be harmless, authorities and the airline said.
